org.oasis.openc2.lycan.args

Class Args

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.oasis.openc2.lycan.utilities.OpenC2Map<java.lang.String>
      • org.oasis.openc2.lycan.args.Args

  • public class Args
extends OpenC2Map<java.lang.String>
    Args object holds the command level args that are to be associated with the ActionType of the message.

    • Constructor Summary

      Args()
      Constructor to create teh args object

    • Method Detail

      • addArg

        public Args addArg(java.lang.String key,
                   java.lang.Object value)
        Add a key/value pair to the args object
        Parameters:
        key - the arg key assigned to the value
        value - value for the key
        Returns:
        Args object to allow for method chaining

      • setArg

        public void setArg(java.lang.String key,
                   java.lang.Object value)
        Set a key/value pair in the args object. This method is a helper method for the Jackson library
        Parameters:
        key - the arg key assigned to the value
        value - value for the key

      • getArgs

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getArgs()
        Get a list of all the args that were passed with the ActionType
        Returns:
        Map object containing the key/value pairs assigned

      • getArg

        public java.lang.Object getArg(java.lang.String key)
        Get a specific value assigned to a key in the args object
        Parameters:
        key - the arg key assigned to the value
        Returns:
        Object that was stored with the key in the map
